items.title: Leveraging Data in Supply Chain Management’s New Normal
items.summary:
Shifting consumer habits, interrupted transportation and unexpected, extreme fluctuations in supply and demand have caused major disruptions in the supply chain.
As the dust settles, the realization that supply chain management will never look the same again has started to sink in.
For decades, supply chain organizations have relied on spreadsheets or pen and paper to track the movement of goods.
Effective data management strategies in supply chain enable organizations to make intelligent decisions based on real-time, reliable data.
There is no shortage of data when it comes to tracking and managing the flow of goods through the supply chain.
